1471369 1 THE FORFEITED DEPOSITS ACT, 1850]
ACT NO. 25 OF 1850 [ 14th June, 1850.] An Act for the forfeiture to Government of deposits made on incomplete sales of land under 2 Regulation 8, 1819. 3
Preamble.-- WHEREAS patnidars 4 fraudulently avail themselves of the 5 provision in section 9, Regulation 8, 1819, of the Bengal Code 6 that forfeited deposits at sales of land 7 for arrears of rent shall be applied as if they were purchase- money. It is enacted as follows:--
242221 2Application of forfeited deposits.-- Any such forfeited deposit shall be applied to defray the expenses of the sale, and the surplus shall be forfeited to Government. 999999 1Short title given by the Amending Act, 1897 (5 of 1897), s. 4 and Sch. III
